Name: Escape The Outbreak
About the game: Escape The Outbreak it's a survival game / action 2D. Abandoned on a remote island, Jack Hawkins fights infected creatures to try to survive this nightmare that seems to have no end, while looking for answers to such events, and a way to get out of this place alive. Find resources around the scene, build items, ammo, automatic weapons, barricades and fight for your life.
